actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for a limitation on the reduction in widow's and widower's insurance benefits currently provided in the case of the early retirement of the deceased spouse, and to provide that widow's and widower's insurance benefits, as well as old-age insurance benefits, may be increased by the application of the delayed retirement credit, and to provide for the treatment of such benefits in cases of simultaneous entitlement.
short_title: Social Security Working Widow Equity Act of 1989
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Working Widow Equity Act of 1989 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to set an additional limit on widow's or widower's insurance benefit reductions that are based upon the early retirement of deceased spouses. Applies the delayed retirement credit to widow's and widower's insurance benefits. Sets forth the rule to be followed in applying such credit when an individual is entitled to both an old-age insurance benefit and to a widow's or widower's insurance benefit.

titles.title: Social Security Working Widow Equity Act of 1989

To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for a limitation on the reduction in widow's and widower's insurance benefits currently provided in the case of the early retirement of the deceased spouse, and to provide that widow's and widower's insurance benefits, as well as old-age insurance benefits, may be increased by the application of the delayed retirement credit, and to provide for the treatment of such benefits in cases of simultaneous entitlement.
